issues.description: The problem statement (UML and text) specifies getTotalNumberOfStudents() as a public method, but the solution implementation declares it as protected. This visibility difference is structural: tests or student code (outside subclasses) that expect to call getTotalNumberOfStudents() as a public API would be unable to access the protected method, causing confusion or test failures.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of getTotalNumberOfStudents() in the solution (and template if a signature is added there) to public to match the UML and textual specification: public int getTotalNumberOfStudents() { ... }
